title: Kalista CONFIRMED.
body:
She has always been on the twisted treeline, no surprise. Even the west altar has her voice and has special lines for Hecarim and other champs.
Even rito confirmed that they will add new VO Lines for twisted treeline once more champs of shadow isles appeared.
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2013/02/thresh-to-get-ttl-altar-lines-in-future.html
And garena has released a video about the " black mist " coming to hunt the 7 shrouded champions.
YOU CAN SEE THAT THE EYES THAT APPEAR AT THE END ARE THE SAME AS THE WOMAN ON THE ALTAR.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Z1fP7ePU8o
Translation of the video:
The Dark Mist is one of the many mysterious things of the Shadow Isles in the land of Runeterra but there are those on the Field of Justice who dare to desecrate the Dark Mist. During this year's Harrowing, they will be living in a nightmare. Twisted Fate, Cassiopeia, Xerath, Hecarim, Leblanc, Zed, Lissandra; these 7 individuals hail from different places in Runeterra but they have all commit an unfogiveable sin. They thought that their past would fade into oblivion; but no, the Dark Mist will never forget, the Dark Mist will make them pay for their sins. The Dark Mist will soon spread to the Field of Justice. Title:  The mysterious Dark Mist of the Harrowing﻿.

Any thoughts ? I expect her to appear this week on PBE for sure.

The lady in the West Altar is the dead wife from centuries ago. Hate to burst your bubble, but that's not Kalista. And the face on the top has always been there since they Reworked the TT. The lady in the Altar is talking about her dead husband, who is in the east altar(kitae confirmed this story of husband and Wife) 
Those lines have always been there, it tells of some of the history of the SI. It's not Senna. You should take a look at that last line "This place was once so beautiful" Senna would have never knew this because she wasn't born in that time.
Facts for you to think about.
